# iru_device_action_lock (Action)

Locks a specific device. This is an imperative action. For macOS, a PIN should be provided. For iOS/iPadOS, the device is locked to the lock screen.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "iru_device_action_lock" "example" {
  device_id = "8a9f88d9-e7f4-47e6-9326-fd4b39534c4e"
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.
